column1: Local Foods////Read reviews on yelp before I went and decided to try the Crunchy chicken sandwich
column2: it did not disappoint. Very tasty meal
column3: it was a bit big for lunch
column4: I ended up taking half the sandwich home. Chips were a bit too toasty for my liking
column5: but not too bad. The other side I got was the quinoa salad which I enjoyed very much.
